trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 ActiveX 控制項的控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `BaseOCXArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX control array.
trans-unit.target: `BaseOCXArray`類別會提供執行階段功能，Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX 控制項陣列的對等項目。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a `BaseOCXArray`, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您具現化`BaseOCXArray`，您也必須呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>方法來建立陣列中的初始項目。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入的焦點離開控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 當您將焦點變更使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等），或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>`Leave`如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項失去或獲得滑鼠捕捉。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件︰ `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp`關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件，而不是第二個`MouseClick`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件是以邏輯方式較高層級的控制項事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常會引發受到其他動作，例如，當控制項取得焦點時按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數<xref:System.EventArgs>資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性個別)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件，而不是`Resize`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>引發以回應`Resize`事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等），藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>變更焦點或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>屬性設定為目前的表單，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>當您在使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法變更焦點時，焦點事件會發生下列順序︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>`Validated`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`false`<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件都會被隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>設`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>事件都會被隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
